meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 1,000 kilograms.
meanings.sent1: The farmer measured the grain in milliers before selling it.
meanings.sent2: There were milliers of books stacked in the library.
meanings.sent3: The millier of feathers on the chicken made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The millier of worries on his mind weighed him down like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The millier of bricks in the truck made it difficult to drive uphill.

meanings.sent1: She had a millier of reasons to celebrate her birthday.
meanings.sent2: A millier of stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The millier of balloons at the party created a colorful spectacle.
meanings.sent4: The millier of footsteps echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The millier of leaves falling in autumn painted the ground in shades of red and gold.
